channel.title: I have four simple questions about my private server!
channel.description:
Please Don't remove topic if it's in wrong section, it took a while to post this :( Could you allow it please? I'm not sure if this is where I am to post this, but here are my questions.
[b]Reward for answering questions:[/b] [b]Rep+[/b]
[b]My first question is:[/b] Do you know how when you double click run.bat or whatever it is, you sometimes get a cmd and a client loading right? Well my cmd is named, "your client" and I'd like to change it to my servers name.
Could someone tell me how to change that to what I want it to be?
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/6232/picture1gk.png[/img]
[b]My second question is:[/b] How do I change the title of the client (on the title bar)? Right now it says, "Core pking by Core" I'd like to change that to my servers name.
This is a side question: How do I change where it says, "HyBriD PvP is loading - please wait..." You know when you wait for a private server to load theres a red bar going higher and higher each time it loads a part of something. And there is a text on top of the loading bar.
How do I change that text? [img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/8241/picture2dbh.png[/img]
[b]Third question:[/b] How do I change where it shows above "Login" and "New User", "Welcome to RuneScape" but in this case, "Welcome to HyBriD PvP."
[img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/1618/picture3rl.png[/img]
[b]My fourth question is:[/b] How do I change the text for when you click the option, "New User" and it tells you "Create a free account" and the text under those words telling how you create a free account.
[img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/1986/picture4ia.png[/img]
[b][size=36pt]When answering these questions, please state which file I look in, what I search for, and I guess how I change it lol..[/size][/b] :P

@Aceron4 wrote:

Ah, Im suprised I didnt think of that either. :I

Read full topic

item.title: I have four simple questions about my private server!
item.dc:creator: @Aceron4 Aceron4
item.description:
@Aceron4 wrote:

[quote=“wiggitywoo, post:7, topic:388167”][quote author=Aceron4 link=topic=483982.msg3545700#msg3545700 date=1301180263]

Thanks guys, i figured it all out accept for the title bar but I’ll see if i can find it, and if anyone wishes to answer any more questions, just answer the title bar one pl0x! =D thx guys, big helps.

Oh, sorry. Forgot that wasnt in Client.java

Its in Gui.java
[/quote]

I don’t have anything called gui in my client, but i’m pretty sure i’ll find one in my source files, but that won’t do anything =[/quote]

Nah, that wont be in your Source Files. Its going to be in your client files.

By the way. If you upload a link to your client I can help you look for it.

Read full topic
item.source: I have four simple questions about my private server!

item.title: I have four simple questions about my private server!
item.dc:creator: @Aceron4 Aceron4
item.description:
@Aceron4 wrote:

Well … basically you just need to open up client.java and search for “Core Pking by Core” and also look for “HyBrid PvP” in that same file.

For the Command Prompt when you right click on it click on “edit” and look for a line that starts with “title” and then put your servers name after that.

As for the background. You will have to find a new image and replace the old one with yours.

Read full topic
item.source: I have four simple questions about my private server!

item.title: I have four simple questions about my private server!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You can change ‘your client’ in the cmd file, right click the batch file.

You can change the rest of the stuff, and should be in the Client.Java, their should be one thing that you shouldn’t be able to change which I don’t know were it is because I know don’t know the format of the files.

Read full topic
